question:
What is the error in this JavaScript code?

for i = 0; i < 5; i++) { console.log(i); }

What is the error in this JavaScript code?

for (let i = 0, i < 5; i++) { console.log(i); }

What is the error in this JavaScript code?

for (let i = 0; i < 5; i--) { console.log(i); }
options: Loop condition should use 'i++' instead of 'i--'

question:
What is the error in this JavaScript code?

for (let i = 0; i < 5) { console.log(i); i++; }
options: Missing increment step in the loop definition

question:
What is the error in this JavaScript code?

for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++); { console.log(i); }
options: Extra semicolon after the for loop
i is not defined inside the loop

question:
What is the output of this JavaScript code?

for (let i = 0; i < 3; i++) { setTimeout(() => console.log(i), 1000); }

What is the issue in this JavaScript code?

for (var i = 0; i < 3; i++) { setTimeout(() => console.log(i), 1000); }
